attributes.action: abolish the human rights of all prisoners so as to ensure prison becomes a real deterrent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With crime rife in the United Kingdom of Great Briain and Northern Ireland, the only real solution, is to ensure prison once more becomes a strong deterrent. The only method of achieving this is to remove the human rights of all prisoners so as to make them fear jail.
This is currently outside the remit of the PM and government, therefore, we the undersigned also petition the PM to grant the PM powers over this matter.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
